channel.title: How do i create my own server
channel.description:
can someone help me create a server? i have jdk6 winrar souces registered wid no-ip have hamchi
i just dont no how to create
mod tahrock guide confused me
if u can help email or post here thomas_donnelly_06@msn.com
if i get working server person who helps me will be co-owner :) :) :)

item.title: How do i create my own server
item.dc:creator: @bib bib
item.description:
@bib wrote:

open up your source folder look for runserver.bat
then open up hamachi
look at the numbers(thats your ip)
type that in as the ip
when you open runserver it should say strating whateverscape on 0:0:0:0:5555(or 43594)
thats your port and login

Read full topic
item.source: How do i create my own server
